data.name: AgreeTermsOfService
data.value: U moet akkoord gaan met onze Algemene Voorwaarden
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to create a new MEGA account without accept previously the 'Terms of Service'.

data.name: ConfirmAccountFailed
data.value: Mislukt account te bevestigen. Probeer het alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: ConfirmAccountFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ConfirmAccountSucces
data.value: Uw account is aangemaakt, bevestigd en geactiveerd. U wordt automatisch ingelogd.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully.

data.name: ConfirmAccountSucces_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ConfirmNeeded
data.value: Controleer uw e-mail en klik op de link om in te loggen en bevestig uw account
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account.

data.name: ConfirmNeeded_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreateAccountFailed
data.value: MEGA Cloud Schijf account aanmaak is mislukt. Probeer het alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CreateAccountFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreateFolderFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a folder failed.

data.name: CreateFolderFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreateFolderSuccess
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when create a folder successfully.

data.name: CreateFolderSuccess_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when create a folder successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DeleteNodeFailed
data.value: Verwijderen van item mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to delete a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: DeleteNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to delete a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DownloadLinkFailed
data.value: Het ophalen van de download link is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when failed to retrieve a download link.

data.name: DownloadLinkFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when failed to retrieve a download link - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DownloadNodeFailed
data.value: Mislukt het bestand te downloaden. Probeer het alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: DownloadNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FetchingNodesFailed
data.value: Kon geen bestanden en mappen ophalen bij MEGA. Probeer het alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to fetch nodes from the MEGA cloud service failed.

data.name: FetchingNodesFailed_Title
data.value: Het ophalen van gegevens is mislukt
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to fetch nodes from the MEGA cloud service failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FolderCreateFailed
data.value: Maken van een map is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to create a folder failed.

data.name: FolderCreateFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to create a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetLinkFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a link to a node failed.

data.name: GetLinkFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a link to a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPreviewFailed
data.value: Mislukt om het voorbeeld op te halen
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image preview failed.

data.name: GetPreviewFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image preview failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ImageSaved
data.value: Afbeelding succesvol geëxporteerd naar 'opgeslagen foto's' album
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a image is saved/exported successfully saved to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device.

data.name: ImageSaved_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a image is saved/exported successfully saved to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ImageSaveError
data.value: Fout exporteren afbeelding om album 'opgeslagen foto's'. Probeer het nogmaals
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to save/export an image to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device.

data.name: ImageSaveError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to save/export an image to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ImportFileFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LinkCopiedToClipboard
data.value: MEGA koppeling is gekopieerd naar uw klembord
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard finished successfully.

data.name: LinkCopiedToClipboard_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoginFailed
data.value: MEGA Cloud Schijf login mislukt. Probeer het opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the login to the MEGA cloud service api fails. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: LoginFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the login to the MEGA cloud service api fails - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveEqualsParent
data.value: Doelmap is hetzelfde als de bronmap. Verplaatsing is geannuleerd.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move nodes and the destination folder is the same than the source folder.

data.name: MoveEqualsParent_Title
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move nodes and the destination folder is the same than the source folder - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveFailed
data.value: Verplaatsen van item is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move a file failed.

data.name: MoveFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move a file failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PasswordsDoNotMatch
data.value: Wachtwoorden komen niet overeen. Probeer opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create a MEGA account and the introduced passwords don't match.

data.name: PictureSaved
data.value: De afbeelding is opgeslagen in uw foto album
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when save successfully a single picture in the photo album.

data.name: PictureSaved_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when save successfully a single picture in the photo album - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveItemQuestion
data.value: Weet u zeker dat u {0} wilt verwijderen?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove definitely an itemfrom the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to do it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the item to be removed in runtime.

data.name: RemoveItemQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed, asking for confirmation to do it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveNodeFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: RemoveNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveNodeSuccess
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when remove successfully a node definitely from the rubbish bin.

data.name: RemoveNodeSuccess_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when remove successfully a node definitely from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RenameNodeFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove definitely an item node from the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: RenameNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove definitely an item node from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RequiredFieldsConfirmAccount
data.value: Vul alstublieft uw gekozen wachtwoord in.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for confirm account are not filled in.

data.name: RequiredFieldsCreateAccount
data.value: Vul uw naam, e-mailadres en wachtwoord in
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for create account are not filled in.

data.name: RequiredFieldsLogin
data.value: Vul alstublieft uw e-mailadres en uw MEGA wachtwoord in.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for login are not filled in.

data.name: RequiredFields_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when any required field is not filled in - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SaveImageQuestion
data.value: Uw huidige afbeelding naar 'opgeslagen foto' album exporteren?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to save a image to the 'saved pictures' album, asking for confirmation to do it.

data.name: SaveImageQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to save a image to the 'saved pictures' album, asking for confirmation to do it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UserNotOnline
data.value: U bent niet ingelogd bij MEGA. Log alstublieft opnieuw in.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is online and is trying to do any operation that requires connection.

data.name: UserNotOnline_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is online and is trying to do any operation that requires connection - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetThumbnailFailed
data.value: Mislukt om miniatuur op te halen [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image thumbnail failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetThumbnailFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image thumbnail failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetAccountDetailsFailed
data.value: Mislukt om uw accountgegevens op te halen. Gelieve opnieuw te proberen. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user account details failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetAccountDetailsFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user account details failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoggedOut
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user logged out successfully.

data.name: LoggedOut_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user logged out successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LogoutFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the logout to the MEGA cloud service api fails. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: LogoutFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the logout to the MEGA cloud service api fails - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MultiSelectRemoveQuestion
data.value: Weet u zeker dat u {0} artikelen wilt verwijderen?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be removed in runtime.

data.name: MultiSelectRemoveQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MultiRemoveSucces
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when remove successfully multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

data.name: MultiRemoveSucces_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when remove successfully multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinFailed
data.value: Mislukt het bestand naar prullenbak te verplaatsen. Probeer het alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move nodes to the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move nodes to the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinQuestion
data.value: Weet u zeker dat u {0} wilt verplaatsen naar prullenbak?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move a single node to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the node to be moved in runtime.

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to move a single node to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinSuccess
data.value: Het object is verplaatst naar prullenbak
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when move successfully one single node to the rubbish bin.

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinSuccess_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when move successfully one single node to the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MultiMoveToRubbishBinQuestion
data.value: Weet u zeker dat u {0} artikelen wilt verplaatsen naar prullenbak?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move multiple nodes to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

data.name: MultiMoveToRubbishBinQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to move multiple nodes to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MultiMoveToRubbishBinSucces
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when move successfully multiple nodes to the rubbish bin. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

data.name: MultiMoveToRubbishBinSucces_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when move successfully multiple nodes to the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PendingTransfersLogout
data.value: U hebt {0} transfers in afwachting. Transfers in afwachting van overdrachten zullen worden geannuleerd. Weet u zeker dat u wil uitloggen?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.

data.name: PendingTransfersLogout_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PendingTransfersExit
data.value: Je hebt {0} overdrachten in afwachting. Overdrachten In afwachting van worden geannuleerd. Weet u zeker dat u wilt afsluiten?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.

data.name: PendingTransfersExit_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AlreadyConfirmedAccount
data.value: Het account is al bevestigd. U kunt nu inloggen.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously.

data.name: AlreadyConfirmedAccount_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously - (String as short as possible).

data.name: WrongPassword
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password.

data.name: WrongPassword_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DownloadLimitMessage_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption
data.value: Wilt u de beeldbestanden automatisch exporteren naar uw fotoalbum na het downloaden? U kunt deze instelling op de pagina met instellingen achteraf wijzigen. Andere bestandstypen zullen alleen worden opgeslagen in de lokale opslag van de app.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards.

data.name: PausingTransfersFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed.

data.name: PausingTransfersFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ResumingTransfersFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.

data.name: ResumingTransfersFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.

data.name: MinimalPictureSelection
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element.

data.name: MinimalPictureSelection_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PrepareImageForUploadFailed
data.value: Mislukt afbeelding voor te bereiden: {0} voor upload
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.

data.name: PrepareImageForUploadFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PhotoUploadError
data.value: Mislukt om de foto te uploaden
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed.

data.name: PhotoUploadError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FileNotFound
data.value: Kon het geselecteerde bestand niet vinden
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed.

data.name: FileNotFound_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: OpenFileFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed.

data.name: OpenFileFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UploadSelfieFailed
data.value: Het updaten van selfie afbeelding is mislukt
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed.

data.name: UploadSelfieFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoadNodesFailed
data.value: Kon geen bestanden en mappen laden van MEGA. Probeer het opnieuw of klik op refresh.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service.

data.name: LoadNodesFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PinLockCodesDoNotMatch
data.value: Uw PIN slot codes komen niet overheen. Typ ze opnieuw in en zorg dat ze hetzelfde zijn.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: PinLockCodesDoNotMatch_Title
data.value: PIN slot codes komen niet overeen
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SessionIDError
data.value: U bent afgemeld op dit apparaat vanaf een andere locatie
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error).

data.name: OverquotaAlert
data.value: Handeling niet toegestaan, u zult het opslag limiet van van uw rekening overschrijden. Wilt u uw account upgraden?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type.

data.name: OverquotaAlert_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type - (String as short as possible).

data.name: NoDownloadLocationSelected
data.value:
U heeft geen standaard downloadlocatie voor uw bestanden geselecteerd.
Om verder te gaan met het downloaden, selecteert u een doelmap of gaat u naar voorkeuren om uw standaard downloadlocatie in te stellen.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to download some nodes and the app doesn't have configured a default download location. Asks the user to select a location for this download or configure a default location.

data.name: PrepareFileForUploadFailed
data.value: Mislukt bestand voor te bereiden: {0} voor uploaden
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.

data.name: PrepareFileForUploadFailed_Title
data.value: Het voorbereiden van het bestand mislukte
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SessionIDError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CopyFileFailed
data.value: Mislukt om het geselecteerde bestand te kopiëren: [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CopyFileFailed_Title
data.value: Kopiëren van het bestand is mislukt
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CopyFileUnauthorizedAccessException
data.value: U hebt geen toestemming om dit type bestand te kopiëren naar de doelmap. Waarschijnlijk hebt u het geprobeert op te slaan/te kopiëren naar een SD-kaart, een bestand van een niet ondersteunde type. Gelieve, probeert op te slaan/kopieer het bestand naar intern geheugen van uw apparaat.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type).

data.name: CopyFileUnauthorizedAccessException_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CurrentPinLockCodeDoNotMatch
data.value: Huidige PIN slot is niet correct of komt niet overeen
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: CurrentPinLockCodeDoNotMatch_Title
data.value: Huiige PIN slot komt niet overeen
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code - (String as short as possible). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: PinLockTooShort
data.value: PIN slot moet minstens 4 cijfers bevatten
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: PinLockTooShort_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CacheCleared
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

data.name: CacheCleared_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

data.name: MemoryLimitError
data.value: Onvoldoende geheugen om deze bewerking te voltooien. De app wordt nu stilgelegd
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device.

data.name: MemoryLimitError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_NoButton
data.comment: Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option to only download into the local folder of the app and don't export automatically to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_YesButton
data.comment: Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option automatically download to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SelectFolderFailed
data.value: Mislukt om de map te selecteren. Probeer het nog eens of selecteer een andere map: [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: SelectFolderFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UploadNodeFailed
data.value: Mislukt om bestand te uploaden. Gelieve opnieuw te proberen. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: UploadNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SelectFileFailed
data.value: Het selecteren van bestand(en) is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: SelectFileFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MalformedEmail
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user types a malformed email address.

data.name: WrongEmailPasswordLogin
data.value: Onjuist e-mailadres of wachtwoord. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to login with an e-mail that is not associated with a MEGA account or type a wrong password. Preserve the MEGA word in uppercase.

data.name: DeleteNodeQuestion
data.value: Weet u zeker dat u {0} definitief wilt verwijderen?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include name of the node to be removed in runtime.

data.name: DeleteNodeQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetUserDataFailed
data.value: Het ophalen van uw gebruikersgegevens is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetUserDataFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CapturePhotoFailed
data.value: Vastleggen van de foto is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CapturePhotoFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CapturePhotoVideoFailed
data.value: Vastleggen van foto of video is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo or video failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CapturePhotoVideoFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo or video failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CaptureVideoFailed
data.value: Vastleggen van de video is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture video failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CaptureVideoFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture video failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SaveSettingsFailed
data.value: Instellingen opslaan is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to save settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: SaveSettingsFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to save settings failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ShortCutFailed
data.value: Er is een fout opgetreden bij de poging om een snelkoppeling te openen. Misschien is het een ongeldige snelkoppeling of de doelmap is verwijderd.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut.

data.name: ShortCutFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreditCardStoreFailed
data.value: De creditcardinformatie is niet correct. De creditcard wordt niet belast.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed.

data.name: CreditCardStoreFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RequiredFieldsCreditCardPayment
data.value: Vul alstublieft alle gevraagde velden in en probeer opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for credit card payment are not filled in.

data.name: WrongDataFormatCreditCardPayment
data.value: Het creditcardnummer, maand/jaar geldig tot en het cvv nummer moeten nummeriek zijn. Controleer alstublieft of alles correct is en probeer opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user fill some data with a wrong format during a credit card payment.

data.name: WrongDataFormat_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the user types some data with a wrong format - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CancelSubscriptionFailed
data.value: Het abonnement is niet correct opgezegd. Neem alstublieft contact op met support@mega.nz om uw abonnement op te zeggen.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed.

data.name: CancelSubscriptionFailed_Title
data.value: Annulering van het abonnement is mislukt
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CancelSubscriptionSuccessfully
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully.

data.name: CancelSubscriptionSuccessfully_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CancelSubscription_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialogs displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RequiredFieldsCancelSubscription
data.value: We ontvangen graag uw feedback. Bedankt.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for cancel subscription are not filled in.

data.name: UpgradeAccountFailed
data.value: De handeling is niet goed afgerond. De creditcard wordt niet belast.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed.

data.name: UpgradeAccountFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UpgradeAccountSuccessfully
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully.

data.name: UpgradeAccountSuccessfully_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPaymentMethodsFailed
data.value: Het ophalen van beschikbare betaalmethodes is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment methods failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetPaymentMethodsFailed_Title
data.value: Fout bij het ophalen van betaalmethodes
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment methods failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPaymentUrlFailed
data.value: Het ophalen van de betalings url is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetPaymentUrlFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: BackgroundAgentDisabled
data.value: Agents op achtergrond voor MEGA zijn uitgeschakeld door gebruiker
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application

data.name: BackgroundAgentDisabled_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application

data.name: CameraUploadNeedsStayLoggedIn
data.value: Om de automatische camera uploads correct te laten werken, moet u de optie "Blijf ingelogd " mogelijk maken. Wilt u deze optie inschakelen?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.

data.name: CameraUploadNeedsStayLoggedIn_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.

data.name: DeleteContactQuestion
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove a contact, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include email of the contact to be removed in runtime.

data.name: DeleteContactQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove a contact asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InviteContactAddFailed
data.value: Het contactverzoek kon niet worden verzonden. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed.

data.name: InviteContactAddFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InviteContactAddSuccessfully
data.value: Gebruiker {0} is uitgenodigd en zal op uw lijst met contactpersonen worden weergegeven wanneer ze de uitnodiging hebben geaccepteerd.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact finished successfully - (String as short as possible). Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the contact email in runtime.

data.name: InviteContactAddSuccessfully_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ResourceIntensiveTaskDescription
data.comment: Descripton of the task that automatic uploads photos tot MEGA. Seen in the background services Settings screen

data.name: AccountUpdate
data.value: Uw account is bijgewerkt. Wilt u uw nieuwe accountgegevens controleren?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).

data.name: AccountUpdated_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).

data.name: SSLKeyError
data.value: Onze SSL/TLS-certificaat kan niet worden geverifieerd. Je zou kunnen worden getroffen door een man-in-the-middle-aanval.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).

data.name: SSLKeyError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).

data.name: AutoCameraUploadFailed
data.value: De Auto Camera Upload achtergrondtaak is mislukt. U kunt deze opnieuw inschakelen op de pagina instellingen.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the auto camera upload service failed.

data.name: AutoCameraUploadFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the auto camera upload service failed.

data.name: DeleteContactFailed
data.value: Verwijderen van contactpersoon is mislukt {0}. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a contact failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the contact email in runtime. Preserve the [{1}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: DeleteContactFailed_Title
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a contact failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DeleteMultipleContactsQuestion
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple contacts, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of contacts to be removed in runtime.

data.name: DeleteMultipleContactsQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple contacts asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ChangePasswordFailed
data.value: Wijzigen wachtwoord is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to change the MEGA account password failed.

data.name: ChangePasswordSuccess
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when change a MEGA account password succesfully.

data.name: NewAndOldPasswordMatch
data.value: Het nieuwe en oude wachtwoord kunnen niet overeen komen.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to change his/her MEGA account password and the new password is equal to the old password.

data.name: RequiredFieldsChangePassword
data.value: Vul alstublieft uw oude MEGA wachtwoord en uw nieuwe MEGA wachtwoord in.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for change password are not filled in.

data.name: CloseAllSessionsFailed
data.value: Sluiten van de sessie is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to close or kill all sessions (except current) failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CloseAllSessionsSuccess
data.value: De overige sessies werden succesvol afgesloten.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when close or kill all sessions (except current) successfully.

data.name: CloseSessionFailed
data.value: Sluiten van de sessie is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to close or kill session failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CloseSessionSucces
data.value: De sessie is met succes afgesloten.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when close or kill a session succesfully.

data.name: CleanRubbishBinFailed
data.value: Het legen van de prullenbak is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to empty the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: CleanRubbishBinQuestion
data.value: Weet u zeker dat u alle bestanden uit de prullenbak definitief wil verwijderen?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to empty the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to do it.

data.name: CleanRubbishBinSuccess
data.value: De prullenbak is met succes geleegd.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when empty the rubbish bin succesfully.

data.name: InviteContactAddFailedOwnEmail
data.value: U probeert uw eigen e-mailadres toe te voegen als contactpersoon.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed because the user is trying to his/her own e-mail.

data.name: RemoveLinkFailed
data.value: Link verwijderen is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a link to a node failed.

data.name: NoInternetConnectionMessage
data.value: U kunt deze actie niet uitvoeren. Maak alstublieft verbinding met het internet en probeer het opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to perform any online action without an active Internet connection.

data.name: AM_CancelSubscription
data.value: Je gaat je MEGA abonnement opzeggen. Laat het ons alsjeblieft weten als er iets is wat we kunnen doen om je te helpen van gedachten te veranderen.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking him send a feedback message.

data.name: FolderUnauthorizedAccess
data.value: Je hebt geen toegang tot het pad '{0}'. Selecteer alstublieft een andere en probeer het opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the app or the user doesn't have access to a folder path in the device memory. For example to download a file/folder, create a new folder, etc. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file/folder path in runtime.

data.name: FolderUnauthorizedAccess_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app or the user doesn't have access to a folder path in the device memory. For example to download a file/folder, create a new folder, etc.

data.name: InvalidFileName
data.value: De naam van het bestand '{0}' is niet geldig of heeft ongeldige tekens. Verander het alstublieft en probeer het opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that a file name is not valid or has illegal characters. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file name in runtime.

data.name: InvalidFileName_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file name is not valid or has illegal characters - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PathTooLong
data.value: Het pad van bestand/folder '{0}' is te lang. Wijzig deze a.u.b. en probeer opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the file/folder path is too long. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file/folder name in runtime.

data.name: PathTooLong_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file/folder path is too long - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InvalidFolderNameOrPath
data.value: De naam of het pad van folder '{0}' is niet geldig. Wijzig deze a.u.b. en probeer opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that a folder name or path is not valid or has illegal characters. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file name in runtime.

data.name: InvalidFolderNameOrPath_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file name or path is not valid or has illegal characters - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_InvalidLink
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invliad lick (NO KEY).

data.name: SelectFolderFailedNoErrorCode
data.value: Selecteren van map is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw of selecteer een andere map.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed.

data.name: AM_ImportFileFailed
data.comment:
Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image.
Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: DownloadLimitMessage
data.value: U heeft meer dan {0} items geselecteerd ({1}) om te downloaden. Wilt u doorgaan?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process. Preserve the {0} and ({1}) codes because is for include the maximum reliable download number and the precise number of nodes to be downloaded in runtime.

data.name: AM_CancelSubscriptionConfirmation
data.value: Dank u voor uw feedback! Weet u zeker dat u uw MEGA-abonnement wilt opzeggen?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription. This sentence is for give thanks to the user for the feedback sent during the cancellation process and asking for confirmation to do it.

data.name: AM_ImportFileFailedNoErrorCode
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image.

data.name: AM_PrepareFilesForUploadFailed
data.value: Het voorbereiden van bestand(en) voor de upload is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file(s) for upload failed.

data.name: AM_PrepareFilesForUploadFailed_Title
data.value: Fout tijdens het voorbereiden van bestand(en)
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare file(s) for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_DownloadNodeFailedNoErrorCode
data.value: Bestand downloaden mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw.D
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed.

data.name: AM_LoadFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load something (nodes, out shares, in shares, etc.) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_LoadInSharesFailed
data.value: Het laden van binnenkomende gedeelde items van MEGA is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw of klik op vernieuwen.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the incoming shared items.

data.name: AM_LoadOutSharesFailed
data.value: Het laden van uitgaande gedeelde items van MEGA is mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw of klik op vernieuwen.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the outgoing shared items.

data.name: AM_DeleteSettingsFailed
data.value: Verwijderen van instellingen mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to delete settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: AM_DeleteSettingsFailed_Title
data.value: Fout bij het verwijderen van instellingen
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to delete settings failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_LoadSettingsFailed
data.value: Laden van instellingen mislukt. Probeer alstublieft opnieuw. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to load settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: AM_LoadSettingsFailed_Title
data.value: Fout bij het laden van instellingen
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to load settings failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_CopyLinkToClipboardFailed
data.value: Kopiëren van de MEGA link naar uw klembord mislukt.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard.

data.name: AM_CopyLinkToClipboardFailed_Title
data.value: Fout bij het kopiëren van de link
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_AlreadyLoggedInAlert
data.value: Als u akkoord gaat, zal het huidige account worden uitgelogd en alle offline data zal worden verwijderd. Wilt u doorgaan?
data.comment: Message of the warning dialog shown when you try to confirm an account but you are logged in with another one.

data.name: AM_AlreadyLoggedInAlert_Title
data.value: U bent ingelogd met een ander account
data.comment: Title of the warning dialog shown when you try to confirm an account but you are logged in with another one - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_DecryptionKeyAlertMessage
data.value: Om toegang te krijgen tot deze map / bestand heeft u de decoderingssleutel nodig. Als u de sleutel niet heeft, neem contact op met de maker van de link.
data.comment: Alert message shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents.

data.name: AM_DecryptionKeyAlertTitle
data.comment: Alert title shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_DecryptionKeyNotValid
data.comment: Alert title shown when you have written a decryption key not valid - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_FileLinkUnavailable
data.value: Dat kan te maken hebben met de volgende redenen: - Het bestand is verwijderd omdat de algemene voorwaarden geschonden zijn. - Ongeldige URL - de link die u probeert te bezoeken bestaat niet. - Het bestand is verwijderd door de gebruiker.
data.comment: Error message shown when you open a file link and it's no longer available. It explains the reasons that could be causing it. Keep "\n"

data.name: AM_FolderLinkUnavailable
data.value: Dat kan te maken hebben met de volgende redenen: - De folder link is verwijderd omdat de algemene voorwaarden geschonden zijn. - Ongeldige URL - de link die u probeert te bezoeken bestaat niet. - De folder link is verwijderd door de gebruiker.
data.comment: Error message shown when a folder link doesn't exist. Keep "\n"

data.name: AM_LinkUnavailableTitle
data.comment: Error title shown when you open a file or folder link and it's no longer available - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_OpenLinkFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to open a link failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: AM_OpenLinkFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to open a link failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_DowloadPathUnauthorizedAccess
data.value: You don't have access to the selected download path. Please select a different download path and try again.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because the app or the user don't have access permission to the destination folder.

data.name: AM_DowloadPathUnauthorizedAccess_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because the app or the user don't have access permission to the destination folder
